title: Complete React Developer Course 2024
subtitle: Master React 18+ with TypeScript, Next.js, Redux Toolkit, and modern development practices

instructor.name: Sarah Johnson
instructor.bio: Sarah is a Senior Frontend Engineer at Google with 8+ years of experience building large-scale React applications. She has contributed to open-source projects and taught over 100,000 students worldwide.

whatYouWillLearn: Build modern React applications with React 18+ features
Master React Hooks including useState, useEffect, useContext, and custom hooks
Implement state management with Redux Toolkit and Context API
Create responsive UIs with styled-components and CSS modules
Build full-stack applications with Next.js 14 and App Router
Implement authentication and authorization in React apps
Test React components with Jest and React Testing Library
Deploy React applications to production with Vercel and Netlify
Optimize React performance with React.memo, useMemo, and useCallback
Work with APIs and handle asynchronous operations
Build reusable component libraries with TypeScript
Implement advanced patterns like render props and compound components
requirements: Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Basic command line knowledge is helpful but not required
description:
# Complete React Developer Course 2024

## Why Learn React?

React is the most popular frontend library in the world, used by companies like Facebook, Netflix, Instagram, and Airbnb. This comprehensive course will take you from React beginner to advanced developer.

## What Makes This Course Special?

- **Latest React 18+ Features**: Learn Concurrent Features, Suspense, and Server Components
- **TypeScript Integration**: Build type-safe applications from day one
- **Real-World Projects**: Build 5+ complete applications including an e-commerce site
- **Modern Development**: Use the latest tools and best practices
- **Production Ready**: Deploy applications to real hosting platforms

## Course Projects

1. **Todo Application**: Master React basics with hooks and state management
2. **Weather App**: Work with APIs and handle async operations
3. **E-commerce Platform**: Full-featured shopping cart with authentication
4. **Social Media Dashboard**: Complex state management with Redux Toolkit
5. **Portfolio Website**: Next.js with SSR and dynamic routing

## Who This Course Is For

- Developers wanting to learn React from scratch
- Frontend developers looking to advance their React skills
- Anyone interested in modern web development
- Students preparing for React developer interviews

## What You'll Build

By the end of this course, you'll have built multiple production-ready applications and have the confidence to tackle any React project.

lectures.title: Course Introduction and What We'll Build
What is React and Why Use It?

reviews.title: Excellent course for React beginners and intermediates
reviews.content: This course is absolutely fantastic! Sarah explains complex concepts in a very clear and understandable way. The projects are practical and really help solidify the learning. I went from knowing nothing about React to building my own applications. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Best React course I've taken
reviews.content: I've taken several React courses before, but this one is by far the best. The content is up-to-date with React 18, and the TypeScript integration is seamless. The instructor's teaching style is engaging and the pace is perfect.

reviews.title: Great content, could use more advanced topics
reviews.content: Really solid course with excellent fundamentals. The projects are well-designed and the explanations are clear. I would have liked to see more advanced patterns and performance optimization techniques, but overall very satisfied.
